div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the two months ending December 31st. 1875.
